duties_responsibilities.duty: Train to be knowledgeable on wellness machines and their benefits to comfortably speak to clients.
Eye for detail and anticipate client needs and accommodations.
Responsible for linens, towels, laundry, and folding.
Need to be able to lift up to 30 pounds for various tasks.
Retail sales and training on our POS system for client check-in, check out, and purchases.
Training provided on our wellness machines.
Ability to multitask when busy and being a self-starter when it's not.
